item.title: PHYS105-lecture-20200402
item.description: Announcements # HW 13 Ch 6 due tomorrow Quiz 7 due 4/14 Lab due tomorrow New lab today Revised schedule posted Office hour tomorrow @ 11am Today # Clicker questions # Gravitational force is always attractive. To find the net force equaling 0, solve this for x: Lecture # $G$ is really small, so for it to be appreciable at least one of the masses needs to be big (for instance Earth).
